mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(S.FRDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || 'T' || S.TIME AS "start", S.FRDT, S.TIME as "time", S.P_SCH_NO, S.P_NO, P.NAME AS "title", P.ACTOR, P.CONTENT, P.LOC, P.ADDR, P.PRICE FROM PERFORMANCE_SCHEDULE S, PERFORMANCE P WHERE P.P_NO = S.P_NO

SELECT TO_CHAR(S.FRDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || 'T' || S.TIME AS "start", S.FRDT, S.TIME AS "time", S.P_SCH_NO, S.P_NO, P.NAME AS "title", P.ACTOR, P.CONTENT, P.LOC || ' ' || P.ADDR as "location", P.LOC, P.ADDR, P.PRICE FROM PERFORMANCE_SCHEDULE S, PERFORMANCE P WHERE P.P_NO = S.P_NO AND S.FRDT=#{frDt}
